page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN ODDINGLEY AREA
page.content: Employment in this area involves mainly farming and services.There are sixteen farms each employing labourers who may be full or part time.The services in this area are few and far between.There are three public house,{The Firs,The Bridge Inn}and{The {Pear Tree.}There is a milk round.This is based in Tibberton and is a family business,in which a father employs his son.There are are also three churches, situated at{Hindlip, Martin {Hussingtree}and{Oddingley.}The three churches are served by rectors who are also responsible for other, adjacent parishes. The main source of employment in the area is the village of{Martin {Hussingtree.
